name: Themis' Hands
description:
"Themis' Hands" thrusts players into the role of a brilliant detective, tasked with unraveling the sinister truth behind a shocking bombing incident at a prestigious university. 

As the clock ticks down, players must use every tool at their disposal to gather evidence, interview suspects, and ultimately track down the cold-blooded perpetrators of this heinous act of terrorism. 

Every lead, every clue, and every decision will be critical in bringing the culprits to justice. 

With its pulse-pounding gameplay and gripping storyline, "Themis' Hands" immerses players in a dramatic and high-stakes investigation that will test their wits, determination and ingenuity to the limit.
